name: Superheroes Doctor Surgery
description:
Superhero Doctor Surgery Emergency Simulation is a free mobile game in which all the tools and accessories are free for use for your kids and girls. Every kid has his/her favorite superhero about which he/she is inspired very much. This superhero surgery game is a free educational game for kids to teach some good things about helping the people when they are in trouble. Every kid will be looking to become the true superhero of their parents by helping others and saving life. You can enjoy this free doctor hospital game with your family.

You can perform the leg and arm surgery in this game with different medical tools like injection, stethoscope, x-ray, blood pressure, heart beat checker and stitching as well. Be careful when you are breaking and joining the bones.

Features of Superhero Doctor Surgery:

- High quality game for Kids,girls and high school teens
- Easy to touch and control
- Fun for children of all ages, babies, preschoolers, school children and pre-teens
- Play with your child or let them play alone
- Different gorgeous dresses to choose for superhero
- Dozens of dress accessories
- Lot of medical and treatment tools to use
- Make some beautiful stones like diamond to give regards to your superhero
- Share your creations easily by Save in your images gallery

You can show your doctor and medical skills to your friends and family. It can be the best educational game. You can wait for our upcoming cooking, dress up, makeup and makeover games. Remember, It is the FREE Game to have some real Fun.

TinyBit games, tiny masterpieces !
